content:
That sounds like a great experience! I'd be happy to help you find information about the bird sanctuary you're planning to visit.

Can you please provide me with more details about the sanctuary, such as its name, location, or any other information you may have about it? That way, I can try to find more information about it for you.

Also, that's wonderful that you attended a bird watching workshop at the library and met other enthusiasts! Bird watching can be a great hobby, and it's always exciting to meet like-minded people. You might consider joining a local birding club or group to connect with more people who share your interest. Many sanctuaries and nature centers also offer guided bird walks or tours, which can be a great way to meet other birders and learn more about the birds in your area.

Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with, and I'll do my best to assist you!
